titleStmt.title: The hunting of the fox and the wolfe because they make hauocke of the sheepe of Christ Iesus.
Huntyng of the romyshe wolfe
titleStmt.author: Turner, William, d. 1568.
Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.

notesStmt.note: Another edition, with new prelims and title, of STC 24356, published in 1555[?] with title: The huntyng of the romyshe vuolfe.
The new preface is sometimes attributed to John Knox.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
